snippet.title: "Felix The Cat: Time Bomb" JAVA GAME (MDEV 2007 year) RAREST GAME!
snippet.description:
The game was released in Brazil in 2007 under the name "Felix the Cat: A Bomba Relogio", which translates as "Cat Felix: Time Bomb."

Cat Felix is ​​a fun and playful cat, a character created in the late 19th century. He has a yellow magic bag, capable of creating various objects and weapons that will help the cat defeat the villains who want to destroy him. Felix will need to protect his precious magic bag, the enemies want to steal it.

In this game, the Felix Cat must collect as many time bomb as possible, which the Master Cylinder threw into his bag. Now you will need to help him in this mission, but you need to beware of dangerous creatures that are under water. You must dodge enemies and collect bombs before they explode. Be careful not to touch the coral on the walls. Remember that Felix needs air and you must collect bubbles to breathe them.
Help Felix overcome all the obstacles so that he can finally have his peaceful picnic again. Launch the game and go!
============================================================================
"Felix the Cat: A Bomba Relógio" #FelixTheCatABombaRelógio #FelixTheCat #javagames #джаваигры #игра #игранателефон #мобильнаяигра #phonegame #mobilegame #oldgames
